SEARCH
Module com.mybank
Package CI401.mybank

Class Bank

java.lang.Object
CI401.mybank.Bank
public class Bank extends Object
This class represents a bank, which can hold a maximum number of bank accounts. It provides methods for loading and saving accounts from/to a CSV file, logging transactions, adding accounts, logging in and out, depositing and withdrawing money, getting the balance, transferring money between accounts, updating the password of an account, and getting the statement of an account.

  • Constructor Details

    • Bank

      public Bank()
      Constructor for the Bank class. It initializes the bank and loads the accounts from the CSV file.

  • Method Details

    • logTransaction

      public void logTransaction(int accNumber, String transactionType, int amount, int newBalance)
      Logs a transaction for a specific account.
      Parameters:
      accNumber - The account number.
      transactionType - The type of the transaction.
      amount - The amount of money involved in the transaction.
      newBalance - The new balance of the account after the transaction.

    • addBankAccount

      public boolean addBankAccount(BankAccount a)
      Adds a bank account to the bank.
      Parameters:
      a - The bank account to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the account was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • addBankAccount

      public boolean addBankAccount(int accNumber, String accPasswd, int balance)

    • makeOverdraftBankAccount

      public void makeOverdraftBankAccount(int accNumber, String accPasswd, int balance, int overdraftLimit)

    • makeLimitedWithdrawalBankAccount

      public void makeLimitedWithdrawalBankAccount(int accNumber, String accPasswd, int balance)

    • login

      public boolean login(int newAccNumber, String newAccPasswd)
      Logs in to a specific account.
      Parameters:
      newAccNumber - The account number.
      newAccPasswd - The password of the account.
      Returns:
      true if the login was successful, false otherwise.

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs out from the current account.

    • loggedIn

      public boolean loggedIn()
      Checks if the bank is logged in to an account or not.
      Returns:
      true if the bank is logged in to an account, false otherwise.

    • deposit

      public boolean deposit(int amount)
      Deposits a certain amount of money to the current account.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of money to be deposited.
      Returns:
      true if the deposit was successful, false otherwise.

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(int amount)
      Withdraws a certain amount of money from the current account.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of money to be withdrawn.
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was successful, false otherwise.

    • getBalance

      public int getBalance()
      Gets the balance of the current account.
      Returns:
      The balance of the current account, or -1 if the bank is not logged in to an account.

    • transfer

      public boolean transfer(int sourceAccNumber, int targetAccNumber, int amount)
      Transfers a certain amount of money from a source account to a target account.
      Parameters:
      sourceAccNumber - The account number of the source account.
      targetAccNumber - The account number of the target account.
      amount - The amount of money to be transferred.
      Returns:
      true if the transfer was successful, false otherwise.

    • updatePassword

      public boolean updatePassword(int accNumber, String newPassword)
      Updates the password of a specific account.
      Parameters:
      accNumber - The account number.
      newPassword - The new password.
      Returns:
      true if the password was updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • getStatement

      public String getStatement()
      Gets the statement of the current account.
      Returns:
      The statement of the current account, or an error message if the bank is not logged in to an account.
